item.title: Compiling Ardour
item.description: Install Prerequisites sudo apt install -y libboost-dev sudo apt install -y pkg-config sudo apt install -y alsa sudo apt install -y alsa-base sudo apt install -y alsa-utils sudo apt install -y libasound2-dev sudo apt install -y libglib2.
